entry.title: WIND WARNING , Grand Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain this evening then to flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
